title: Västmanlands Fotbollförbund
text:
The Västmanlands Fotbollförbund "(Västmanland Football Association)" is one of the 24 district organisations of the <a href="Swedish%20Football%20Association">Swedish Football Association</a>. It administers lower tier and youth <a href="association%20football">football</a> in the eastern half of the historical province of <a href="V%C3%A4stmanland">Västmanland</a>, namely <a href="V%C3%A4stmanland%20County">Västmanland County</a>.
Background.
The Association was founded on 1 August 1938 and currently has 72 member clubs serving 12,000 players and officials. Based in <a href="V%C3%A4ster%C3%A5s">Västerås</a>, the Association's Chairman is Birger Jonsson.
The main goal of VFF is to promote, manage and develop football in Västmanland. From their district, several professional and international soccer players such as <a href="Stefan%20Pettersson%20%28footballer%29">Stefan Pettersson</a>, <a href="Pontus%20K%C3%A5mark">Pontus Kåmark</a>, <a href="Gary%20Sundgren">Gary Sundgren</a>, <a href="Peter%20Markstedt">Peter Markstedt</a>, <a href="Fredrik%20Stenman">Fredrik Stenman</a>, <a href="Jonny%20R%C3%B6dlund">Jonny Rödlund</a>, Åsa Jakobsson, Susanne Hedberg and Malin Flink.
Affiliated members.
The following clubs are affiliated to the Västmanlands FF:
League Competitions.
Västmanlands FF run the following League Competitions:
Men's Football.
<a href="Swedish%20football%20Division%204">Division 4</a> - one section
<a href="Swedish%20football%20Division%205">Division 5</a> - one section
<a href="Swedish%20football%20Division%206">Division 6</a> - one section
<a href="Swedish%20football%20Division%207">Division 7</a> - one section
<a href="Swedish%20football%20Division%208">Division 8</a> - one section
Women's Football.
<a href="Swedish%20Women%27s%20Football%20Division%203">Division 3</a> - one section
<a href="Swedish%20Women%27s%20Football%20Division%204">Division 4</a> - one section
<a href="Swedish%20Women%27s%20Football%20Division%205">Division 5</a> - one section
